plot: Caillou eagerly awaits the first snowfall of winter, and imagines himself building the biggest snowman in the world. Caillou wants to play hockey with Billy and the other big kids, but he finds he just can't keep up with them. Mummy can't find Caillou's toboggan for the playschool tobogganing trip and Caillou is certain he'll miss out on all the fun.—Anonymous
